title: Rapha reshapes new Gore-Tex jackets from insulated Pro Team to commuter Field Coat
content:
Rapha again partners with Gore-Tex to develop unique waterproof cycling jackets for riding in the most foul weather conditions, this time opting for more durable fabric and insulation for everyday road & commuting rides. Two new Pro Team Gore-Tex jackets offer protection for road and gravel riding in the rain and cold. Then, an all-new

The post Rapha reshapes new Gore-Tex jackets from insulated Pro Team to commuter Field Coat appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
